title: Government Snooping Allowed by One Court (Audio)
itunes:title: Government Snooping Allowed by One Court (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Noah Feldman, a professor at Harvard Law School, and a Bloomberg View contributor, discusses why one U.S. appeals court, which allows warrantless government surveillance. He speaks with Michael Best and June Grasso on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
